about.message: I am a dedicated professional who strives to perform tasks to the best of my ability. My strong communication skills enable me to collaborate effectively with others, and I am always eager to learn and apply new knowledge. My approach to work is defined by a blend of meticulous attention to detail and a drive to meet and exceed targets. I take pride in delivering high-quality results and embracing change as a pathway to improvement. I believe that challenging oneself is essential for personal and professional growth, and I thrive on turning challenges into opportunities. My aim is to add value to the workplace through hard work, perseverance, effective communication, and active listening.
about.name: Anushqa Tamryn Kandan

resume.description: I graduated with a bachelors certificate at Spine Road High where I was also the Head Girl in my matric year. I was part of many extra curricular activities such as Interfaith, school choir,DIY, and played certain sports such as softball, baseball and volleyball. I also represented my school in 2018 at the South African institute of international affairs that took place in Johannesburg where I gave a presentation about climate change before 5 United Nations members.
I Studied a Bachelor of Science in biodiversity and conservation biology, however due to financial issues with NSFAS I had to drop out at the beginning of my 3rd year.
I worked as an agent at Sigma for 3 months where I was constantly a Top performer. While being there I have attained valuable skills including time management and how to multi-task efficiently.
I am currently studying Software development and attaining various skills sets, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Online Store
projects.description: For my project, I developed an online store for Indian jewelry, featuring a diverse range of traditional and modern designs. The site offers an easy browsing experience, detailed descriptions, and secure purchases, bringing exquisite Indian craftsmanship to a global market.

projects.name: Full-stack E-comerce Project
projects.description: I developed a full-stack e-commerce platform specializing in the sale of gemstones. The site is designed to provide a seamless and engaging user experience, featuring product filtering, a dynamic cart system, and responsive design to ensure compatibility across devices. The platform also offers an intuitive admin interface for managing products, categories, and various users registered with the platform.

projects.name: NodeJS E-commerce Project
projects.description: I co-developed a full-stack e-commerce platform focused on selling tech products. Collaborating with a partner, we implemented a user-friendly shopping experience with features such as product filtering and searching. The project emphasized responsive design, ensuring an optimized experience on both desktop and mobile. We also developed an intuitive admin panel for product and user management, streamlining the backend operations for tech sales.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Here I created a virtual calculator, a software tool that performs arithmetic and scientific calculations. It features a user-friendly interface and advanced functions, providing accurate results for both basic and complex mathematical operations.

projects.name: Salon
projects.description: I designed a salon poster showcasing various makeup services. It features a stylish graphic and lists options for each service.The vibrant design aims to attract clients and clearly shows what the salon offers.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: For this project, I developed a to-do list app that helps you organize chores or assignments. It features an easy-to-use interface for adding, sorting, and managing tasks, ensuring you stay on top of your responsibilities and improve productivity.

testimonials.message: Anushqa is a very bright and hardworking individual who is always striving to do her best. She is extremely kind and her willingness to help others is of admiration. She never ceases to amaze me with her knowledge of coding and is the most down to earth person you can have a conversation with.
